entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
